page1: ^Puttinâ€™ the word out to any other law 'round here. Folks have been riled up somethin' awful as of late, come cryin' to me about every bump in the night.
^Time to time, folk claim to see rail security yankin' a worker off the line. Some of 'em go on about monsters or some such that they seen outside of town.

^So, if you ain't heard from the Overseer, let me be clear: DO NOT INTERVENE. There are bigger things happenin' than you or I would care to know about. And trust me, if you go diggin' your noses into it, it won't be them that do you in.
